Physical Modeling Utilities for C++

Introduction

This package will contain a number of utilities (mostly headers) to support the development of applications that perform physical modeling tasks. Currently, only the Dimensioned Quantities module exists, but as modular functionality is developed, it will be included.

The goal is to use modern C++ design and practices to facilitate simpler implementation of physical modeling tasks. Templates will be used extensively. Advanced metaprogramming may be used internally, but when possible it will not be exposed to the developer-user.

Modules of Functionality

  • Dimensioned Quantities: Assign dimensions (mass, length, speed) to your variables, and let the compiler support and enforce dimensional compatibility.
